name: Boobs or gtfo
description:
You're Amy, a simple 2D girl with a hot 3D girlfriend who has been kidnapped by an evil mastermind who has locked her in a cage and is forcing her to dance and strip, and you're running to try and save her, but you're being thwarted by the penises of death.

Or, something like that. There's no actual plot in this game, it's a simple infinite runner with a few twists: there's a 3D girl dancing in a cage while you play, and she removes her clothing based on your score (lifetime - so even if you keep dying, you'll eventually get her naked).

Also, you die if you accidentally touch a penis.
